title: Saa (1905) Bible - Gospels
description: Sa or Saa language is an Austronesian language spoken in southern Pentecost Island, Vanuatu. It had an estimated 2,500 speakers in the year 2000.  Sa has numerous dialects, with no well-established names or boundaries. At a meeting in 2008, speakers recognised four main dialects, with sub-dialectal variation and mixing of dialects in some areas.
provider: The British and Foreign Bible Society

language.name: Sa'a
language.area: Three Sisters Islands, south Malaita Island, Ulawa Island.
